page.title: 19Traffic in N.St Ives.
page.content: Most people drive vehicles.Half of those people have had an accident. Most people ride bikes.Some of them have witnessed accidents and believe it or not one person had an accident on a zebra crossing.Not many people have had accidents on bikes.Most of the people who have,remember them. A lot of people use a Pelican Crossing.There is one person though who says that she just dashes straight across.The people who walk to school or work don't live further than 2 miles away.There is a very dangerous road infront of our school but luckily there is a lollypop lady for safety reasons.Car and coach are the most popular forms of transport but some people prefer walking.Some people would use public transport if it was improved to expected standards,but most people would prefer to use a car.
